# Get-ReportDate

## SYNOPSIS
function to get date in format yyyy-MM-dd

## SYNTAX

### Set 1
```
Get-ReportDate
```

## DESCRIPTION
function to get date using the Get-Date cmdlet in the format yyyy-MM-dd

## EXAMPLES

### PS C:\\\> $rptDate = Get-ReportDate

```powershell
C:\PS> Get-ReportDate
```

## PARAMETERS

## INPUTS

### None


## OUTPUTS

### System.String
